rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area designed to greet visitors and provide a transition into the duplex studio apartment bungalow. Vastu considerations include positioning the entrance in the north or east direction.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: A combined living and dining space that serves as a multifunctional area. It features large windows for natural light and an open layout promoting energy efficiency.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An eco-friendly kitchen with modern appliances integrated into the design. The layout prioritizes efficient workflow and ventilation, following local building norms and Vastu guidelines for functional spaces.

rooms.name: Studio Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious studio bedroom that doubles as a living area. Designed with energy-efficient insulation and natural light in mind to promote comfort throughout the year.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact yet functional bathroom adhering to local plumbing standards and designed for sustainability with water-saving fixtures.

openings.description: Main entry door designed to enhance security and energy efficiency. Placed in the north-east for positive Vastu flow.
Large windows allowing natural light and ventilation, oriented to maximize solar gain during the cooler months while minimizing overheating.
Energy-efficient windows with proper shading and ventilation for sustainable kitchen design.
A balcony that provides access to the large garden and fresh air, with eco-friendly materials used in construction.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom designed with sound insulation and energy-efficient materials. Vastu guidelines ensure a peaceful sleep environment.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: An additional guest bedroom adhering to local norms and optimized for natural ventilation. The layout is designed considering privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: A dedicated study area with ample lighting and ergonomic design for productivity while following Vastu principles for knowledge and creativity spaces.

openings.description: A well-designed staircase ensuring safe vertical circulation between floors. Incorporates energy-efficient lighting.
Large window designed for natural light and ventilation while preserving privacy.

garden.description: A large garden spanning approximately one-third of the plot area. Designed with native plants, water-saving irrigation systems, and eco-friendly landscaping practices to promote biodiversity and energy efficiency.
